name.description: A valid project short name WITH NO whitespaces

title.description: Title of the project being displayed on client

version.description: Version number of the project being displayed on client

buildPath.description: Destination folder where all packed files are being stored

privateKey.description: The private key to use to sign the client pbo files

serverDirs.description: A list of all server folders a pbo file should be generated for

clientDirs.description: A list of all client folders (usually one) a pbo file should be generated and signed for

ftpConnectionFile.description: Used to separate the fton connection (credentials) from its main configuration. PLEASE NOTE: This will overwrite the ftpConnection property

host.description: The ftp server hostname or ip address

postProcess.description: Used to run additional scripts, once a commend has been executed

packFolders.description: Define a script to run after all folders have been packed

transferFiles.description: Define a script to run after all files are transfered to the remote

runClient.description: Define a script to run after arma is started

runClientAndLog.description: Define a script to run after arma is started (with logfile opened)

generateKey.description: Define a script to run after a bikey has been generated
